subject: Horse Racing
Kentucky Derby
lead_paragraph: The Pamplemousse will not run in the Kentucky Derby next month, although the colt’s racing career is not over. The Pamplemousse was scratched because of a tendon problem hours before Saturday’s $750,000 Santa Anita Derby, in which he was the 9-5 morning-line favorite.
